channel.title: Personal on Ejas Muhammed
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Ejas Muhammed

item.title: Disagree, if you disagree
item.description: If you never express your disagreement and instead decide to reach a compromise where your opinions are suppressed, from then on, you are lying, and you lose significance.

item.title: Clear your mess, right now
item.description: Resigning from my company is how I cleared my mess. Untangling is not easy but it brings clarity.

item.title: 👨🏽‍🚀 The astronaut analogy…
item.description: The story of my love towards outer-space theme and the astronaut analogy! 👨🏽‍🚀 🪐 ✨
